title: Technical Enrichment Functionality in Customer Portal to collect enrichment parameters Q3
description:
Description
  For whom Customer
who has the obligation to provide information
provided using a wizard
In our customer portal

Business Scope:
For the technical enrichment data from the customer are necessary. Therefore, a wizard (= function in customer portal) in the customer portal should guide the customer through a easy and light process to answer a questionaire to gather the information. These information should enrich the configuration template to be uploaded in Netcracker/MIST (separate EPIC).
acceptance_criteria: Process is aligned with security and data privacy demands.
Wizzard can be used by customer AND DT personal (e.g. Service Manager) on behalf of the customer. (related to role & rights concept)
The wizard can be used for LAN/WiFi Settings and (separate wizard) for MIST SD-WAN
